dialogue.text: The question continues in you. Water it daily with wonder.
After the funeral, Maya finds his final note: 'The question continues in you. Water it daily with wonder.'
The question of what we are. Grandpa spent his life learning to be friends with not knowing.

visual_elements.memorial_gathering: Hundreds in spiral garden where journey began

psychological_notes: Shows successful transmission of questioning practice across generations. Maya receives both burden and gift of continuing the work. The note's simplicity reflects lifetime of wisdom distilled. Community continues beyond individual. Children already being prepared for their own questioning.
philosophical_underpinning: Individual mortality cannot stop eternal questions
therapeutic_direction: Death as transformation not ending of therapeutic work
